title: Space Force rolls out new naming scheme for satellites and space weapons
description:
Gen. Chance Saltzman unveils a taxonomy linking system names to mission areas, echoing legacy traditions across the military

The post Space Force rolls out new naming scheme for satellites and space weapons appeared first on SpaceNews.
